Structs/GradientPoint/Location.html.name: Location
Structs/GradientPoint/Location.html.abstract: Represents a valid coordinate for either the x or the y of a GradientPoint.

Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:8Skeleton1.name: init(x:y:)
Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:8Skeleton1.abstract: Initializes a GradientPoint given an x and a y. They both default to .default.

Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:8Skeleton1.name: cgPoint
Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:8Skeleton1.abstract: A convenient way to convert a GradientPoint to a CGPoint.

Structs/GradientPoint.html.name: GradientPoint
Structs/GradientPoint.html.abstract: Represents a valid point for a CAGradientLayer’s startPoint or endPoint when beginning or ending a slide.

Structs/GradientTransition.html.name: GradientTransition
Structs/GradientTransition.html.abstract: A struct representing a transition between two GradientPoints.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.name: gradientLayers
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.abstract: The CAGradientLayers that will be sliding when slide(to dir: Direction) is called.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.name: slide(to:group:)
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.abstract: A convenient way to slide the GradientOwner’s corresponding gradientLayers.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.name: stopSliding()
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:8Skelet.abstract: A convenient way to stop sliding the GradientOwner’s corresponding gradientLayers.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html.name: GradientsOwner
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html.abstract: A protocol that allows grouping CAGradientLayers together. Useful to have built-in sliding

Extensions/CABasicAnimation.html#/s:So16.name: apply(gradientTransition:)
Extensions/CABasicAnimation.html#/s:So16.abstract: A convenient way to apply a GradientTransition to a CABasicAnimation.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.name: gradientLayer
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.abstract: A convenient way to access the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.name: slide(to:group:)
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.abstract: A convenient way to slide the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.name: stopSliding()
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:8Skeleton12.abstract: A convenient way to stop sliding the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:8S.name: gradientLayer
Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:8S.abstract: A convenient way to access the GradientContainerView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientContainerView.html.name: GradientContainerView
Classes/GradientContainerView.html.abstract: A view that contains a GradientView. Useful for sliding a CAGradientLayer without
